name: A Second Hand Experience
description:
You were bored so you decided to make a bird house, now look what happened... 

In  A Second Hand Experience four players cooperate and compete to control the handyman's hand, following its brutal separation from its owner. Take a walk around his workshop, see if you can find your way back and avoid the dangerous machinery - we wouldn't want you to cut yourselves and spawn a sequel... 

Made by:
Kristoffer Lind Holm - programmer

Esben Gravesen - programmer

Nilas Røpke Driessen - Sound Design and Composer

Tue Sanggaard - 3D artist

Emil Friis Ernst - concept art

Johanna Thiery - concept art

Viljam Smed - 3D generalist
